notes_translated.fr: Cet ensemble de donnees indique le nombre quotidien moyen d'hommes et de femmes places en detention dans les unites specialisees du Centre de detention d'Ottawa-Carleton de l'exercice 2005-2006 a l'exercice 2017-2018.  Les unites specialisees comprennent : * l'unite des services medicaux * l'unite de detention preventive * l'isolement * l'unite des services en matiere de besoins particuliers Pour en savoir plus, consultez la page Groupe d'examen concernant le Centre de detention d'Ottawa-Carleton [analyse des tendances trimestrielles](http://www.mcscs.jus.gov.on.ca/french/Servicescorrectionnels/OCDCGroupedexamenconcernant%E2%80%93Analysedestendancestrimestrielles_fr.html). Volets connexes au present jeu de donnees : * [Alertes à l’admission au Centre de détention d’Ottawa-Carleton](/fr/dataset/ottawa-carleton-detention-centre-admissions-alerts) * [Admissions en detention au Centre de detention d'Ottawa-Carleton](/fr/dataset/ottawa-carleton-detention-centre-admissions-to-custody) * [Nombre de detenus quotidien moyen au Centre de detention d'Ottawa-Carleton](/fr/dataset/ottawa-carleton-detention-centre-average-daily-counts) * [Nombre de detenus dans les unites specialisees du Centre de detention d'Ottawa-Carleton](/fr/dataset/ottawa-carleton-detention-centre-utilization-rates)
notes_translated.en: This dataset provides the average daily count of male and female inmates held in specialized units  at the Ottawa-Carleton Detention Centre covering fiscal years 2005-06 through to 2017-18.  Specialized units include: * Medical unit * Protective custody unit * Segregation unit * Special needs unit For more information, please see the Ottawa-Carleton Detention Centre [Quarterly Trends Analysis](http://www.mcscs.jus.gov.on.ca/english/Corrections/OttawaCarletonDetentionCentreTaskForce/OCDCTaskForce%E2%80%93QuarterlyTrendsAnalysis.html). This dataset is related to the following: * [Ottawa-Carleton Detention Centre admissions alerts](/dataset/ottawa-carleton-detention-centre-admissions-alerts) * [Ottawa-Carleton Detention Centre admissions to custody](/dataset/ottawa-carleton-detention-centre-admissions-to-custody) * [Ottawa-Carleton Detention Centre average daily counts](/dataset/ottawa-carleton-detention-centre-average-daily-counts) * [Ottawa-Carleton Detention Centre utilization rates](/dataset/ottawa-carleton-detention-centre-utilization-rates)

notes: This dataset provides the average daily count of male and female inmates held in specialized units  at the Ottawa-Carleton Detention Centre covering fiscal years 2005-06 through to 2017-18.  Specialized units include: * Medical unit * Protective custody unit * Segregation unit * Special needs unit For more information, please see the Ottawa-Carleton Detention Centre [Quarterly Trends Analysis](http://www.mcscs.jus.gov.on.ca/english/Corrections/OttawaCarletonDetentionCentreTaskForce/OCDCTaskForce%E2%80%93QuarterlyTrendsAnalysis.html).
